_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Bridor USA, Inc is a manufacturer of bread and pastry.  It is leasing the facility built by Pastridor USA LLC in Vineland, NJ.  The facility is in the Vineland Industrial Park adjacent to New Jersey Route 55 at Exit 35, on the north side of Vineland.  The only chemical of concern for off-site consequences is ammonia.  The ammonia, in both liquid and gaseous form,  will be the in the freezer/refrigeration system.  It is the policy of Bridor USA, Inc to operate the system in the safest possible manner.

The facilty was built by Pastridor USA as a replica of a facilty in Europe.  Pastridor had built three other facilities all with excellent safety records.  The best of the European and American practices have been used to construct this facility.  This facility has been operating for over one year and has had an excellent safety record.  In accordance with the Federal Occupational Safety and Health Administration (29 CFR 1910.119), Environmental Protection Agency (40 CFR 68) and New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection (NJAC 7:31) Regulations this facility has prepared a Process Safety Management Program, as well as performing air dispersion modeling and off-site consequence analysis.

Recognizing the limitations imposed by low staffing levels at a highly automated facility, Bridor has adopted a three level response system based upon the level of release.  The three levels are Maintenance, Moderate, and Major.  The maintenance staff will function in a proactive manner to prevent releases, but react to control and end larger accidental releases consistant with their training and equipment.

All employees will be trained in the hazards of ammonia and their actions in the unlikely event of a release.  Personnel not having a maintenance function will be internally evacuated to a "safe haven" within the building until the situation is declared safe.  In the event of an accidental release to the outside of the building all staff will remain inside.  The maintneance

personnel will act to determine the source of the release and take appropiate safe action.

Bridor USA, I nc is not establishing an Emergency Response Team as a result of the staffing constraints.  The on-site maintenance staff will perform such actions as can be safey performed within their training.  Off-site Emergency Management will be notified at the earliest possible time.  This will include an emergency maintneance contractor and regulatory agenciesThe philosophy of Bridor USA, Inc is prevention, not response. The personnel of Bridor will be trained to operate and maintain the refrigeration system in the safest posible manner.
